ArkhamAsylum.text: You are mistaken for an inmate. Doctor Mintz has the guards subdue you and conducts an experiment. Make a Will(-1[2] check to discover the results. If you pass, the injections seem to increase your capacity for learning. Draw 1 Skill. If you fail, his memory drug fails miserably, resulting in lost knowledge. You must discard one of the following (your choice), if able: 4 Clue tokens, or 2 Spells or 1 Skill.

IndependenceSquare.text: Pass a Fight(-1) check to intimidate a policeman or he rousts you from the park. Move to the street..

BankOfArkham.text: You see a richly dressed man making a large withdrawl. On the way out, he lights his cigar with a piece of green paper which he then drops on the ground. Pass a Speed(-1) check to stub it out with your toe before it burns up. You discover it to be a slightly singed two Dollar bill. Gain $2.
